title: Mobile-Based Competency Development Program Design: Model-Centered Engineering Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational grasp of social science concepts and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners need advanced social sector competencies for employment preparation, with a structure enabling short-term intensive learning in mobile environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify the core components of a competency development program (learning units, design, services) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can design a competency development program by transforming it into three or more stages using a model-based approach.
Learners can interpret competency-related terminology with 90% accuracy by applying an ontology-based definition system.
Learners can generate a personalized competency development roadmap within two weeks in a mobile environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
